content:
I used to feel sad about goodbyes whenever I saw the station site,
But now that the station is actually built...
The fireworks are just so beautiful~baa!
info: 车站建成庆典-绵朵_友邻任务闲聊

content:
Station built, Astralink named,
In that sparkly moment when Fireworks bloom,
Life lands on "rainbow-tinted tiptoes," baa-daa, how adorable!
info: 车站建成庆典-绵朵_友邻任务闲聊

content:
Our station's color scheme is the prettiest of them all, baa~
You're asking if that's a professional opinion?
A compliment straight from the heart is the most professional answer there could be, baa-daa~
info: 车站建成庆典-绵朵_友邻任务闲聊
